subject: Споразумение
attachmentsData:
MUTUAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT
On 14th of June 2023, the following Agreement was concluded by and between:
1. TIBIEL EOOD, Private company registered under the laws of Republic of
Bulgaria with registration number Nº 106588084 in the Commercial register and
register of NPLE, having seat and management address at: Republic of Bugaria,
City of Sofia, 29 Knyaz Aleksandar Dondukov Blvd., fl. 1, represented by Dimityr
Jordanov Ivanov as first party
2. LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED, Private company registered in Cyprus under
registration number Nº HE 332787, with address: Nicosia, 2560, Agia Varvara,
Prosfygon Nº 4, Cyprus, represented by Alackon Limited, No HE 361492 -
company and its director Ala Antoniou as second party and
3. BUL ENERGY RADIATION CONSULTANT, a company established and
registered under the laws of United Arab Emirates, with Professional License No.
967160, having seat and management address at Office No. 901, Business Bay,
P.O.Box 29904, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, represented by Mustafa Sami
Mustafa Ammouri, as third party
the present agreement was signed for the settlement of mutual duties up to the amount of
503 500 /Five Hundred Three Thousand Five Hundred/ euros, and the parties noted and
agreed on the following:
Art. 1. TIBIEL EOOD owes to LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED an amount of 503 500
/Five Hundred Three Thousand Five Hundred/ euros, representing a distributed dividend
according to the Protocol of the sole owner of the capital dated 12.06.2023.
Art. 2. LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED owes to BUL ENERGY RADIATION
CONSULTANT an amount of 503 500 /Five Hundred Three Thousand Five Hundred/
euros, partial payment according to the Agreement for cooperation and confidentiality
between LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED and BUL ENERGY RADIATION CONSULTANT
for the management of activities from 3th of April 2023.
In view of the above, TIBIEL EOOD, LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED and BUL
ENERGY RADIATION CONSULTANT have agreed to the following:
Art. 3. TIBIEL EOOD undertakes to pay the amount due to LIFOND INVESTMENT
LIMITED in the amount of 503 500 /Five Hundred Three Thousand Five Hundred/ euros,
directly to the bank account of BUL ENERGY RADIATION CONSULTANT, and the parties
accept that payment of the specified amount will discharge the obligations described
above between them up to the amount specified.
Art. 4. The agreements reached with this protocol enter into force from the day of its
signing.
This agreement is signed in three identical copies, one for each party.
For TIBIEL EOOD
For LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED
Ar
Dimityr Jordanov Ivanov
Ala Antoniou
For BUL ENERGY RADIATION CONSULTANT
7
Mustafa Sami Mustafa Ammouri
